title: Star Pulse Medium Freighter

Two Laser Cannons (Fire Linked)

Space Range: 1-3/12/23
Atmosphere Range: 100-300/1.2/2.3KM Damage: 5D == Capsule: == The Star Pulse freighter entered into the market shortly after the YT-2400 appeared on the interstellar scene. Designed by Hyrotil, it quietly took some of the Outer Rim freighter market. It's ease of adaptability and modification allowed it to be used for a variety of uses. Today, it is seen very commonly in the Outer Rim territories, and making strides to enter the Mid Rim.
